allMakeupProducts.name: NIRVANA Color Eye and Face Palette SANJHBELA
allMakeupProducts.description: The Nirvana Color Smokey Eye and Face Palette is a must-have for creating gorgeous smokey eye looks. It includes 9 highly pigmented shades in matte, shimmery, and glittery finishes, as well as contour, blush and highlighter. The versatile color range and easy-to-blend formula make this palette ideal for any makeup lover.

allMakeupProducts.name: Swiss Beauty 36 Color Eyeshadow Palette Shade 01
allMakeupProducts.description: A large tropical tree that bears the world’s biggest fruit, the jackfruit. Its sweet and aromatic flesh is both nutritious and filling, and the tree itself provides generous shade.

allMakeupProducts.name: Farmasi Soft Focus BB Powder 02 Medium
allMakeupProducts.description: BB All-in One compact powder is a light and soft powder which gives the skin soft look by naturally covering imperfections. Apply over a BB cream for buildable coverage or alone for a matte finish.

allMakeupProducts.name: L.A. Girl Pro BB Cream GBB942 Light
allMakeupProducts.description: HD PRO BB Cream is formulated without parabens and made fragrance-free to pamper sensitive skin and lavishly nourish skin with added Vitamin B3, C and E. The silky formula covers a wide range of skin tones with eight diverse shades. This is your all-in-one skin beautifier that primes, moisturizes and enhances skin tone.

allMakeupProducts.name: Benefit Hoola Matte Bronzer Hoola Light

All shades feature the same soft, blendable formula and matte finish that made original Hoola a cult-favorite. The entire Hoola bronzer collection ranges from light to deep so you can sweep on a natural-looking bronze. Comes complete with a built-in mirror and powder brush for a sunless & seamless application.
